ValidationRule.description: If Record Type <> Renewal and Opportunity Deal Type <> New Business, then the Prior PGi Contract field is required.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( $User.ProfileId != "00e30000001kms9", RecordType.Id = "01213000001NeTgAAK", NOT(ISPICKVAL(Opportunity_Deal_Type__c, "New Business")), ISBLANK(Prior_PGi_Contract__c) = TRUE )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The "Prior PGi Contract" field is required.
